alert.note: Alert for Faribault; Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 5:57AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FARIBAULT AND SOUTHWESTERN FREEBORN COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM CDT... At 555 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frost, or 21 miles northwest of Forest City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Alden, Bricelyn, Mansfield, Frost, Twin Lakes, Conger, Kiester, Brush Creek, and Walters. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 130 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
